alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 6:45PM EDT until June 26 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SCHUYLER AND NORTHERN CHEMUNG COUNTIES... At 645 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elmira Heights, or near Elmira, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Elmira, Big Flats, Horseheads, Elmira Heights, Erin, Catharine, Odessa, Cayuta, Millport and Breesport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
